security_audit.summary: This is a documentation-only skill containing no executable code. All 91 static findings are FALSE POSITIVES. The scanner misidentified markdown syntax (MD extension), documentation headings, and markdown code block backticks as security threats.

content.value_statement: Transform content into engaging Xiaohongshu-style infographic series. Auto-selects visual styles and layouts based on content analysis. Generates 1-10 cartoon-style images optimized for the Xiaohongshu platform.
actual_capabilities: Generates 1-10 image infographic series for Xiaohongshu platform
Auto-selects from 9 visual styles (cute, fresh, tech, warm, bold, minimal, retro, pop, notion)
Auto-selects from 6 layout types (sparse, balanced, dense, list, comparison, flow)
Analyzes content to recommend optimal style and layout combinations
Outputs organized image series with outlines and prompts
Supports both file input and direct content paste
limitations: Requires an image generation skill (like baoyu-gemini-web) to actually create images
Output quality depends on the underlying image generation capability
Does not support video or animation content

best_practices: Use --style and --layout flags when you have specific visual requirements
Match style to content type: tech articles work best with notion/tech, lifestyle with cute/fresh
Keep individual image content focused: 1-2 main points for sparse, up to 8 for dense layouts
anti_patterns: Do not use overly long content per image - dense layout has limits
Avoid mixing incompatible styles across a single series
Do not skip the cover image - it is essential for engagement

faq.question: How many images does it generate?
faq.answer: The skill analyzes content complexity and generates 2-10 images. Simple topics get 2-3 images, tutorials 4-6, deep dives 7-10.

faq.question: What styles work best for business content?
faq.answer: Minimal and notion styles work best for professional business content. Bold works well for important announcements.

faq.question: Can I mix different layouts in one series?
faq.answer: Yes, the skill automatically assigns sparse to covers, appropriate layouts to content pages, and sparse/balanced to endings.

faq.question: What image generation skill should I use?
faq.answer: Use baoyu-gemini-web or any image generation skill. The skill will prompt you to choose if multiple are available.

faq.question: Does it support Chinese content?
faq.answer: Yes, the skill fully supports Chinese content and Xiaohongshu's native aesthetic. Output language matches input.

faq.question: Where are images saved?
faq.answer: Images save to xhs-images/ subdirectory next to the source file, or xhs-outputs/ folder for direct input.
